short_summary: W8486-228583 - Data Support Services for the DRMIS
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## Title (English)
 W8486-228583 - Data Support Services for the Defence Resource Management Information System (DRMIS)

## Title (French)
 W8486-228583 - Services de soutien des données pour le Système d’information de la gestion des ressources de la Défense (SIGRD)

## Reference Number
WS3841474646-Doc3841869993

## Solicitation Number
WS3841474646

## Amendment Number
4

## Publication Date
2023-01-24

## Tender Closing Date
2023-03-03 14:00:00 Eastern Standard Time (EST)

## Amendment Date
2023-02-24

## Expected Contract Start Date
None

## Expected Contract End Date
None

## Tender Status (English)
This tender has expired.

## Tender Status (French)
Cet appel d’offres a expiré.

## Goods and Services Code (GSIN)
None

## Category
SRV

## Notice Type
RFP against Supply Arrangement

## Bidder Selection Process
Competitive - Selective tendering

## Award Criteria
Selection will be based on a combined rating of technical merit and price.

## Trade Agreements
This tender is subject to the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), Canada- Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), and other agreements.

## Tender Description
Amendment: Bidders must submit all required supporting documentation and bids before the closing time of 14:00 PM EST on March 3, 2023. Late bids will be declared non-responsive.

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking proposals for data support services to support the Defence Resource Management Information System (DRMIS).

## Contact Information
Aresta, Arden
(Email: arden.aresta@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

## Regions of Opportunity
None

## Regions of Delivery
National Capital Region (NCR)

Gatineau, Quebec, Canada
K1A 0S5

## End User Entity Name and Address

Ottawa, Ontario, Canada
